source:
%%sql
-- Build Employee_Dim table 

-- Notes - Addresses are only supplied for Inspectors - need to check inspector count against addresses data

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.employee_dim (
    EmployeeID,
    FirstName,
    LastName,
    DOB,
    NINumber,
    Gender,
    AddressLine1,
    AddressLine2,
    AddressLine3,
    City,
    County,
    PostCode,
    EmailAddress,
    TelephoneNumberPersonal,
    TelephoneNumberWork,
    PersNumber,
    EmployeeNumber,
    FTE,
    WorkHours,
    PartTimeEmployee,
    EmploymentStatus,
    CivilServiceStart,
    DateToCurrentJob,
    SeniorityDate,
    OrgStartDate,
    FixTermEndDate,
    LoanStartDate,
    LoanEndDate,
    --PayrollArea,
    AssignmentNumber,
    --EmployeeGroup,
    AnnualSalary,
    ReasonForAction,
    AnnualLeaveStartDate,
    Currency,
    DateToSubstantiveGrade,
    LegacyEmployeeNumber,
    SourceSystemID,
    StartDate,
    EndDate,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
)

SELECT 
    Row_Number() over (order by T1.Pers_No NULLS FIRST) as EmployeeID,
    T1.First_name as FirstName,
    T1.Last_name as LastName,
    T1.Birth_date as DOB,
    T1.NI_number as NINumber,
    T1.Gender_Key as Gender,
    T2.Street_and_House_Number as AddressLine1,
    T2.`2nd_Address_Line` as AddressLine2,
    T2.District as AddressLine3,
    T2.City as City,
    T2.Region_State_Province_Count as County,
    T2.Postal_Code as PostCode,
    T3.Email_Address as EmailAddress,
    T2.Personal_Mobile as TelephoneNumberPersonal,
    T2.Work_Mobile as TelephoneNumberWork,
    T2.Staff_Number as PersNumber,
    T1.Pers_No as EmployeeNumber,
    T1.FTE,
    T1.Wk_hrs as WorkHours,
    T1.Indicator_Part_Time_Employee as PartTimeEmployee,
    T1.Employment_Status as EmploymentStatus,
    NULL as CivilServiceStart,
    NULL as DateToCurrentJob,
    NULL as SeniorityDate,
    NULL as OrgStartDate,
    NULL as FixTermEndDate,
    NULL as LoanStartDate,
    NULL as LoadEndDate,
    --T1.Payroll_Area as PayrollArea,
    T1.Assignment_Number as AssignmentNumber,
    --T1.Employee_Group as EmployeeGroup,
    NULL as AnnualSalary, -- T1.Annual_salary
    T1.Reason_for_Action as ReasonForAction,
    T5.AnnualLeaveStartDate,
    T1.curr as Currency,
    T1.Date_to_Subst_Grade as DateToSubstantiveGrade,
    T1.Employee_No as LegacyEmployeeNumber,
    T4.SourceSystemID,
    current_timestamp as StartDate,
    NULL as EndDate,
    current_timestamp as IngestionDate,
    NULL as ValidTo,
    md5(concat( IFNULL(T1.First_name,'.'),IFNULL(T1.Last_name,'.'),IFNULL(T1.Birth_date,'.'), IFNULL(T1.NI_number, '.'), IFNULL(T1.Gender_Key, '.'), IFNULL(T2.Street_and_House_Number, '.'),IFNULL(T2.`2nd_Address_Line`, '.'),
                IFNULL(T2.District, '.'),IFNULL(T2.City, '.'),IFNULL(T2.Region_State_Province_Count, '.'),IFNULL(T2.Postal_Code, '.'),IFNULL(T3.Email_Address, '.'),IFNULL(T2.Personal_Mobile, '.'),
                IFNULL(T2.Work_Mobile, '.'),IFNULL(T2.Staff_Number, '.'),IFNULL(T1.Pers_No, '.'),IFNULL(T1.FTE,'.'),IFNULL(T1.Wk_hrs,'.'),IFNULL(T1.Indicator_Part_Time_Employee,'.'),T1.Employment_Status,IFNULL(T1.Civil_Service_Start, '.'),IFNULL(T1.Date_to_Current_Job, '.'),
                IFNULL(T1.Seniority_Date, '.'),IFNULL(T1.Org_Start_Date, '.'),IFNULL(T1.Fix_Term_End_Date, '.'),IFNULL(T1.Loan_End_Date, '.'),IFNULL(T1.Loan_Start_Date, '.'),IFNULL(T1.Payroll_Area,'.'),IFNULL(T1.Assignment_Number, '.'),
                IFNULL(T1.Employee_Group,'.'),IFNULL(T1.Reason_for_Action,'.'),IFNULL(T5.AnnualLeaveStartDate,'.'),IFNULL(T1.curr,'.'), IFNULL(T1.Date_to_Subst_Grade,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.Employee_No,'.'))) as RowID, 
    'Y' as IsActive

FROM odw_standardised_db.vw_saphr_historic T1
LEFT JOIN odw_standardised_db.vw_addresses T2 ON T1.Pers_No = T2.Staff_Number
LEFT JOIN odw_standardised_db.vw_email T3 ON T1.Pers_No = T3.Staff_Number
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.sourcesystem_fact T4 ON "SAP HR" = T4.Description and T4.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT staff_number, max(ded_from) as AnnualLeaveStartDate
            FROM odw_standardised_db.vw_leave
            GRoup BY Staff_Number) T5 ON T1.Pers_No = T5.staff_number

%%sql

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.hr_record_fact (

    HRRecordID, -- surrogate key
    EmployeeID,
    CoCd,
    CompanyCode,
    PersonnelAreaID,
    PersonnelSubAreaID,
    OrganisationalUnitID,
    ContractID,
    PayBandID,
    CostCenterID,
    PositionID,
    ManagerEmployeeID,
    ManagerPositionID,
    CounterSignManagerEmployeeID,
    LocationID,
    WorkScheduleID,
    EmployeeGroupID,
    PayrollAreaID,
    SourceSystemID,
    StartDate,
    EndDate,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
    
    )

SELECT
    Row_Number() over (order by T2.EmployeeID) as HRRecordID,
    T2.EmployeeID AS EmployeeID,
    T1.CoCd,
    T1.Company_Code,
    T3.PersonnelAreaID AS PersonnelAreaID,
    T4.PersonnelSubAreaID AS PersonnelSubAreaID,
    T5.OrganisationUnitID AS OrganisationalUnitID,
    T6.ContractID AS ContractID,
    T7.PayBandID AS PayBandID, -- NULLS occur due to contractors
    T8.CostCenterID AS CostCenterID,
    T9.PositionID AS PositionID,
    T10.ManagerEmployeeID AS ManagerEmployeeID,
    TempMPID.PositionID AS ManagerPositionID,
    NULL AS CounterSignManagerEmployeeID,
    T11.LocationID AS LocationID,
    T12.WorkScheduleID AS WorkScheduleID,
    T13.EmployeeGroupID,
    T13b.PayrollAreaID,
    T14.SourceSystemID,
    current_timestamp as StartDate,
    NULL as EndDate,
    current_timestamp as IngestionDate,
    NULL as ValidTo,
    md5(concat(T2.EmployeeID, IFNULL(T3.PersonnelAreaID, '.'), IFNULL(T4.PersonnelSubAreaID, '.'), IFNULL(T5.OrganisationUnitID, '.'),IFNULL(T6.ContractID, '.'),
                IFNULL(T7.PayBandID, '.'),IFNULL(T8.CostCenterID, '.'),IFNULL(T9.PositionID, '.'),IFNULL(T10.ManagerEmployeeID, '.'),IFNULL(TempMPID.PositionID, '.'),
                IFNULL(NULL, '.'), IFNULL(T11.LocationID, '.'),IFNULL(T12.WorkScheduleID, '.'),IFNULL(T13.EmployeeGroupID, '.'),IFNULL(T13b.PayrollAreaID, '.'))) as RowID, 
    'Y' as IsActive

FROM odw_standardised_db.vw_saphr_historic T1 
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.employee_dim T2 ON T1.Pers_No = T2.EmployeeNumber AND T2.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.personnelarea_dim T3 ON T1.PA = T3.PersonnelAreaCode AND T3.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.personnelsubarea_dim T4 ON T1.PSubArea = T4.PersonnelSubAreaCode AND T4.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.organisationunit_dim T5 ON T1.Org_unit = T5.OrganisationUnit and
                                                        T1.Organizational_Unit = T5.Description AND T5.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.contract_dim T6 ON T1.WorkC = T6.ContractCode AND 
                                                CASE 
                                                        WHEN T1.CT IS NULL
                                                        THEN 'N/A'
                                                        ELSE T1.CT
                                                END = T6.ContractTypeCode AND T6.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.payband_dim T7 ON T1.PS_group = T7.PSGroupCode AND T7.IsActive = 'Y' -- NULLS occur due to contractors
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.costcenter_dim T8 ON T1.Cost_Ctr = T8.CostCenterCode AND T8.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.position_dim T9 ON T1.Position= T9.PositionCode AND T9.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.position_dim TempMPID ON T1.Manager_Position = TempMPID.PositionCode AND TempMPID.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.employee_hr_hierarchy_dim T10 ON T2.EmployeeID = T10.EmployeeID AND T10.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.pins_location_dim T11 ON T1.Loc = T11.LocationCode AND T11.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN (
            SELECT T1.EmployeeID, T1.WorkScheduleID
            FROM odw_harmonised_db.absence_dim T1
            INNER JOIN ( SELECT EmployeeID, Max(AbsenceEndDate) as Max_AbsenceEndDate
                         FROM odw_harmonised_db.absence_dim
                         Where IsActive = 'Y'
                         GROUP BY EmployeeID ) T3        ON  T1.EmployeeID = T3.EmployeeID AND
                                                             T1.AbsenceEndDate = T3.Max_AbsenceEndDate
            where IsActive = 'Y'
            GROUP BY T1.EmployeeID, T1.WorkScheduleID
            
    ) T12 ON T2.EmployeeID = T12.EmployeeID  -- NULLS occur as no data for some employees in the absence file

LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.EmployeeGroup_dim T13 ON T1.EEGrp = T13.EEGrp and T13.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.payrollarea_dim T13b ON T1.PArea = T13b.PayrollAreaCode and T13b.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.sourcesystem_fact T14 ON "SAP HR" = T14.Description AND T14.IsActive = 'Y'
